description.short: Lance - Licensing Automation & Notification Copilot for Enterprises
description.full: Help IT departments efficiently manage, monitor, and optimize the allocation and usage of M365 Copilot licenses, ensuring licenses are used effectively and communication with users is streamlined.

commands.title: List Inactive Copilot Users
commands.description: Show me all users who haven't used Copilot in the last 30 days

commands.description: Reassign license from john.doe@company.com to jane.smith@company.com

commands.title: Assign License
commands.description: Assign a Copilot license to the next person on the waitlist

commands.title: Remove License
commands.description: Remove Copilot license from inactive users

commands.title: Reallocate Licenses
